hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model

Class Sphere

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.GraphicalObject
      • hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.Sphere

  • public class Sphere
extends hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.GraphicalObject
    Class Sphere models sphere in 3D coordinate system. Sphere is characterized with its center Point3D and its radius. Sphere surface is characterized by reflective and diffuse components represented by multiply coefficients. This class extends GraphicalObject and implements its abstract method for finding intersection with Ray. Algorithm used for finding intersection can be looked at this link: 
     http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Line%E2%80%93sphere_intersection
    Author:
    Domagoj
    See Also:
    Point3D

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sphere

        public Sphere(hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.Point3D center,
              double radius,
              double kdr,
              double kdg,
              double kdb,
              double krr,
              double krg,
              double krb,
              double krn)
        Creates new Sphere in 3D coordinate system with specified center point, radius and coefficients for reflective and diffuse light components.
        Parameters:
        center - Sphere center point
        radius - Sphere radius
        kdr - Coefficient for diffuse component for red color
        kdg - Coefficient for diffuse component for green color
        kdb - Coefficient for diffuse component for blue color
        krr - Coefficient for reflective component for red color
        krg - Coefficient for reflective component for green color
        krb - Coefficient for reflective component for blue color
        krn - Coefficient n for reflective component
